Articles.Content:
Hi there,

I have encountered the problem that KSP (1.0.0.830 (WindowsPlayer) Steam) is apparently resetting the .cfg file every time it starts. I load into the game, adjust the settings to my liking (or use the launcher), exit the game, check the .cfg and everything is looking fine, but once back in KSP all settings are back to default.

Problem remains even after a complete reinstall. Thought in the first place this was caused by a mod, but removed all mods and reinstalled KSP clean but the problem still remains.

Here is the output_log.txt: http://pastebin.com/72q9jg4t

Here is the ksp.log: http://pastebin.com/UYvMLS9Z

Edit: Using the Steam version of KSP, Steam installed in C:\

Edit 2: Logs added

Edit 3: Submitted a bug report on the bugtracker

Edited April 28, 2015 by Andy81le
Hi Andy81le, can you please check the support stickies and post your game logs

I was having the same problem repeatedly (same system setup). I tried exiting KSP, deleting the settings.cfg (after making a backup copy) and then restarting the game. As I anticipated, the game automatically made a new setting.cfg file since it was missing, but now it hasn't reset the .cfg on startup since then.

I think there may be something wrong with the initial one in the download and making a fresh .cfg resolves that problem.
